posts.html:
Dear Co-x3 Family,
This week, we share about quests - how does having a noble mission make us, and the world, better?
It's been a fantastic week for our community - here are some highlights:
Our ambitious mission at Co-x3 is to nurture and grow the largest community of givers, armed with the knowledge and action to effect positive impacts on the world. It's been such an immense pleasure to interact with so many of you over our daily and weekly calls, and learn that we feel similarly in our desires to make the world a better place; if not for ourselves, then for our loved ones who will inherit our legacies. Co-creation and collaboration is core in our community, and over the next few months, we'll be embarking on more and more adventures to defeat world bosses. We've designed an exciting and evolving mechanism to ensure all community members get a chance to be involved:
1.
Directly participating members will be rewarded with community gold and our project will be showcased on our website.
2.
Members can indirectly contribute to noble causes by offering their skills and talents to other members for community gold.
The result is a shared economy of giving, empowering our family to make the world a better place while learning new skills and honing our expertise in our domains.
Let's Change The World →
We have an exciting new initiative proposed by fellow family member Joshwin, and now being rapidly adopted by our community - accountability squads. Upon joining our family, you have the option to join up to 3 squads (each capped at 6 people) to grow together with the family. Each squad has its own unique differences in interests, timezones, and challenges they want to take on - whether it be daily standup, daily stoic (led by Shania), or any future challenges we have.
Join or Start Your Accountability Squad →
We had an 8-hour study with us session on Saturday and we had loads of fun chilling together and getting work done (we even ended up making a music bot!). If you guys are interested in more of these, just send a message inside the community whenever you are starting a work session - we can open a room for anybody to join in!
Of course, you can't have good work without some fun, so that evening, as part of our Saturday games initiatives, we held the third session of our very own tabletop RPG series - Seven Secrets, Seven Sovereigns to relax and stretch our creative muscles in our build-your-own adventure. Our resident designer Vivian will be animating our adventures - so stay tuned for that if you're looking for fun quirky adventures to watch in your spare time! Our next session will be in 3 weeks, we always welcome a good peanut gallery .
Heidi warmed our hearts this week when she shared her review about our family. Here's what she had to say.
Co-x3 is an extremely welcoming community. You can be as little or as much involved as you like. There are members happy to assist you with anything you are trying to achieve. The leaders in the community are so good at making people feel welcome. I am in awe of the work they put into the community, and the "Be Intentional" and "Gamification" systems. I think the way that so many people willingly put in their time and talents to improve the systems and grow the community, really shows what a great community it is. I can't say enough good things about the community. I really think you should check it out for yourself!
It's been an amazing journey, and we feel blessed every time we read a comment or receive a new email with such kind words - thank you so much for being awesome!
+7 patrons have joined our wall of love ! Thank you Mano, Grvrvr, Paolo, Steve, Adam, Duneata, and Shellah! With your support, we can release quality content more regularly, and provide special and customized perks for supporters like you!
Thanks to the help of our patrons, we had an exciting major update to our template packages this week!
Explore the full changelog →
Every week, we are deeply honest about important topics.
Friday Livestream: Q&A On Our Latest Updates (2020-Sep-4)
This week on office hours, we walked through the latest updates to our templates and explained how to replicate the changes if you are catching up from last month's versions.
No Saturday Video This Week: Next One Will Release On 2020-Sep-12
Sunday Catchup: Co-x3 Weekly Council Meeting #22 (2020-Sep-06)
This week, we had a great discussion about negative reinforcement, accountability, and deep work Skip to 1:04:15 to watch our first council decision on world boss rewards!
Constant learning is an important part of your growth journey, and we try to read as much as we can to learn as fast as we can. Every week, we'll share key insights from the best pieces of content we digest.
Quote: “I judge you unfortunate because you have never lived through misfortune. You have passed through life without an opponent—no one can ever know what you are capable of, not even you.” - Seneca, On Providence, 4.3
•
Every hero needs a worthy opponent;
•
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger;
•
It is in times of stress, that your true capabilities are revealed.
Let's get highly motivated to personally develop ourselves, develop accountability, and collaborate to bring positive social impacts to our local and global communities.
Collaboration Opportunities
•
We're looking for someone well versed in python and available to explore a social impact project involving building an AI chatbot! We're going to have our first meeting about this exciting project this week - let us know if you want to get involved!
•
We're building a collaborative knowledge factory! If you have experience with roam, obsidian, etc. let us know - we'll be happy to learn about your experience and see how we can improve it with some cool new tools...
•
A smart (written) index of all our content is desperately needed, and we're currently exploring different ways we can make the knowledge more accessible and meaningful to our members. Let us know if you'd like to help!
Explore all open collaboration opportunities here →
Upcoming Events
On office hours this Friday, we'll be cloning popular investment trackers like Mint, M1 Finance, Stash, and others in Notion with special guest Travis Washington. If you have good examples of what features you want us to build, let us know by joining in on the brainstorming process on this notion page or by replying to this email!
Set A Reminder Here (and subscribe!) →
Starting next week, we're exploring new collaboration segments for our livestreams starting next week (w co-hosts). Join our community to vote - what sounds most interesting to you?
Join Our Regular Events To Level Up Everyday With Co-x3
•
Stay accountable. Report your daily stand-up and get help on things you are stuck on.
•
Don't work alone. Join our virtual meetings at 9am Eastern to wind up/wind down for the day. Stay on to study with us or learn a new language!
•
Keep learning. Learn new ways to tackle everyday challenges at 11am Eastern every day.
Check out our events schedule →
Let's keep each other accountable on our growth journey. I'd love to start a conversation with you. Reply on this email and send your response to this question:
What is your real-life superpower, and how does that help you on your own personal mission?
posts.title: Our Ambitious Mission 🔮
posts.desc: This week, we share about quests - how does having a noble mission make us, and the world, better?
